chapter.title: Introduction
chapter.para: This part of the manual describes how the user interface part (presentation tier) also called client of Wolframe applications can be built.
A Wolframe clients can be of various forms. They are communicating with the server over a text based protocol in an plain or encrypted session. All methods used are based on open standards.
We will indroduce two examples of clients: The Wolframe standard client and a web client communicating via a webserver with the Wolframe application server.
After reading this chapter you should be able to create a Wolframe client based of one of these two examples on your own.
